objects.specification: An expansive classroom floor surface with a warm earthy-toned wooden texture, featuring subtle grain detail and a slightly polished finish for durability and realism.
A tall smooth plaster wall painted in a muted green-brown color with a subtle matte finish and slight texture, designed for mounting educational materials.

A large rectangular wooden teacher's desk with a rich earthy finish, sturdy tapered legs, subtle dinosaur bone engraving along the edge, and a slightly worn but polished surface.
An ergonomic high-backed wooden chair with a dark brown finish, plush green cushion upholstery, subtle curved armrests, and sturdy metal supports.
A large rectangular whiteboard with a sleek silver aluminum frame, smooth matte writing surface, and integrated marker tray, designed for clear visibility.
A standard student desk with a light brown wooden top, tubular metal legs, modesty panel at the front, and an earthy matte finish.
A simple student chair with a curved wooden backrest, matching wooden seat, and slender dark metal frame, finished in a warm earthy tone.

A large museum-style dinosaur skeleton model with intricately detailed bone textures in an off-white hue, mounted on a slender metal support frame for stability and realism.
A tall wooden bookshelf with a warm brown finish, five evenly spaced shelves filled with colorful dinosaur-themed books and small decorative fossils, and a solid back panel.

A large rectangular window with a light wooden frame, clear glass panes, and floor-length green fabric curtains draped on each side.
A small square wooden side table with a warm brown finish and slender metal legs, topped by a detailed globe model depicting prehistoric Earth eras in muted green and brown tones.
